subject: Question about Simsonn Pro pedals
description_text:
[image: image.png]
The pedals I have are the ones I’m sending you in the image. Is there any
software update that works for this model?
A friend told me that there were several software updates, but I’m afraid
to update.
Could you confirm that there won’t be any problems?

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Milosensas M,  Please confirm whether your controller box version is 1.7.0 or 1.7.1. If it’s version 1.7.1, you can upgrade and use SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3 to calibrate the pedals.

Hi,
my firmware is 1.7.0.3 if I remember correctly.
The software I'm currently using is version 3, since version 4 doesn't
recognize the pedals unless I'm missing something.
Can you help me? Perhaps changing the box where the cables connect might
improve things?
I have no idea.


El sáb, 10 ene 2026 a las 3:49, service@simsonn.com (

Hi Milosensas M,  The controller box running version 1.7.0 cannot be updated. We recommend upgrading to the latest PlusX controller box, which supports the vibration feedback interface and is fully compatible with the latest calibration software, SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3, providing a more complete and stable experience.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498     https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
